PSL Camera is an Android application that allows user to put their favorite team filters from Pakistan Super League. The application allows you to (a) take photos using the application or (b) uploading preexisting photos from gallery onto the application. You can then apply different stylized filters to the photos. Once you choose a filter, photo transforms. You can then share the photos to social media channels i.e. Facebook and WhatsApp or save them to your device for personal use.
